title.value: RF shimming in the cervical spinal cord at 7 T
title.justification: The title "RF shimming in the cervical spinal cord at 7 T" is prominently mentioned at the beginning of the paper, just after the DOI and before the authors' names.
title.quote: RF shimming in the cervical spinal cord at 7 T

extractions.description: The paper explores several RF shimming techniques for improving 7 T MRI imaging of the cervical spinal cord, addressing the challenges of transmit field inhomogeneity. It evaluates various RF shimming approaches using a custom 8Tx/20Rx coil across two sites, with an emphasis on improving B1+ efficiency and homogeneity for clearer diagnostics.

type.justification: The paper involves data collection and analysis from participants using experimental techniques at two different sites, which indicates an empirical study.
type.quote: This multisite study explores several RF shimming techniques in the cervical spinal cord.

name.justification: The paper focuses on enhancing MRI techniques at a high field strength for spinal cord imaging, a core topic within the MRI research field.
name.quote: Advancing the development of 7 T MRI for spinal cord imaging is crucial for the enhanced diagnosis and monitoring of various neurodegenerative diseases and traumas.

name.justification: The paper discusses various RF shimming techniques specifically for improving MRI outcomes.
name.quote: This multisite study explores several RF shimming techniques in the cervical spinal cord.

name.justification: The research specifically targets improvements in imaging the cervical spinal cord.
name.quote: Advancing the development of 7 T MRI for spinal cord imaging is crucial.

name.justification: The paper describes the use of an open-source Shimming Toolbox to implement some of the RF shimming techniques.
name.quote: ...four approaches implemented in the open-source Shimming Toolbox.

referenced_paper_title.value: Shimming toolbox: an open-source software toolbox for B0 and B1 shimming in MRI
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper title for the Shimming Toolbox is provided in the citations as the source of the toolbox used.
